title: Gluten free lemon drizzle cake or muffins
ingredients: ['170g unsalted butter, room temperature', '170g soft brown sugar', '120g gluten free plain flour', '50g polenta (cornmeal)', '2 teaspoons gluten free baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 large eggs, beaten', '10g desiccated coconut', '2 unwaxed lemons, zested and juiced', '50g caster sugar']
